description:
This is a derivative collection of "SHARI", a project celebrating the 4th anniversary of the career of mera takeru, a pioneer of crypto art in Japan.
All 88 Inscriptions are inscribed on interesting sats, which are all numbered palindromes, and the numbers are written above and below the skull in Kanji.
Holders of the piece can also earn a special role within the "SHARI" Discord and participate in an exclusive Giveaway.
name: PALI-nscriptions
